testcase.classname: Logged-in user adds products to the cart
testcase.name: Logged-in user can add video games to the cart
testcase.system-out: When clicks on All menu.....................................................passed And clicks on video games...................................................passed And clicks all video games list item........................................passed Then user is surfing Video Games webpage....................................passed When clicks on free shipping checkbox.......................................passed And clicks on New condition.................................................passed And sorts the products by price from high to low............................passed And adds all products that its cost below 15k EGP...........................passed
